ignore-vulnerabilities.reason: Starlette <0.47.2 multipart rollover blocks event loop (CVE-2025-54121). DevSynth does not serve or parse multipart uploads in default/test profiles; FastAPI extra is optional and disabled in CI. FastAPI currently constrains Starlette <0.47.0; we will bump when compatible version is released. Tracked in docs/plan.md Phase 4 sustain.
